item.title: Type Definitions
item.description: Assertions This type enables configuration of required token and claim assertions. Depending on the object type (JWT or introspection response), the assertions apply to different parts of such objects. scopes: Scopes Matcher (optional) Required scopes given to the client. audience: string array (optional) Values to be matched in the aud claim. This assertion evaluates to true if at least one entry in the given audience array is present in the aud claim.
